metadata.description: Everything is surely connected, isn't it? For Hoshino, life after graduation would mean not being able to see his teacher Ms Tsukioka again, even if she is just a simulation -- or is she? If Ms. Tsukioka is a real person and actually exists, does Hoshino have the courage to find her and express his feelings to her? Waiting in the Classroom is the extraordinary story of an unordinary school, a teacher that only appears when the students are sleeping, and an ordinary boy in search of a deeper connection.
metadata.name: Waiting in the Classroom
